title.narrative: To provide emergency assistance and NFI to Afghan Returnees from Pakistan in Konar,

description.narrative: Recruitment and re-assignment of project staff Orientation of project staff on project activiteisllection Listing target beneficiaries through coordination with government authorities and community elders Procurement and transportation of NFIs and hygiene kits to the target province and district. Establishment of distribution committee (ADA team + relevant government authorities+ community elders) Distribution of NFIs and Hygiene kits to the identified beneficiaries by distribution committee. During the distribution of hygiene kits, female distribution officer will raise awareness on personal and environmental hygiene. Field visit and monitoring of the distribution process by project manager and ADA monitoring and evaluation unit. Submit ion of final report to CA.

The most vulnerable 175 families will receive emergency NFI and hygiene kits to support their family members, which will ensure protection from diseases as well as avert related impacts on health, dignity and well-being. The NFI and hygiene kits will help them in improvement in their life conditions through access to required tools and instruments. The support provided to the target families will help them in rehabilitation and will enable them to save money they will be spending on NFIs and hygiene kits. The money saved will help them to cope with other families needs especially during the winter season. The impact will be observed immediately after the distribution of the items and will be long lasting. The awareness raising on hygiene practices will enable female family members of the returnees to take care of their personal and family hygiene.
